website_summaries.verdict: Basic golf set with a very low price point for golfers just starting out with the game.
pros: Limited set of clubs that should serve novices well until they've gained some experience
Set has a driver, a hybrid wood, 5- irons, a putter, and a bag
Steel shaft clubs provide plenty of stability
Hybrid wood is easier to hit than long-shaft irons
Design of irons will help beginners with accuracy
cons: Not a set that will appeal to anyone with playing experience

customer_reviews.title: Cheap irons, nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this product. I was looking for a beginning set or Irons to start my illustrious amateur golf career. Product shipped and came fine. I decided to try them out and took them to the driving range. I hit exactly three balls before the iron head snapped off and flew into the driving range. The only reason this isn't getting a one star, is because the bag is pretty nice. Might be worth it to put in the extra dollar and get a nicer set.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bimar

customer_reviews.title: Good set for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Very good golf club set for a beginner. I have been in the range like 10 times in the last 3 weeks. Clubs are holding on just fine. You can obviously tell these are not the best quality, but for a beginner like me, I think they're just what I need. Golf bag is also nice. It has trouble standing though, you have to use the aid it comes with. Reason why I don't give it a 5 star is because the bag cover came with a couple of small perforations. I reached out to the seller, and they sent one in worst condition than the one with the holes I originally got.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my husband for valentines day. He ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for valentines day. He doesn't golf but once or twice a month during spring and summer, but he likes them and they seem to be holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrena Hays

customer_reviews.title: Youngest Son's New Golf Club Set
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these clubs for my youngest son as he and I love to play golf - he had outgrown the first set and I knew that he would agree to the new set and I was right. We recently played golf in Myrtle beach and he played like a champion scoring just over 90 - he is 12 and has played about 60 games of golf - a real prodigy I hope... The clubs are holding their own and I would buy them again - it was a great investment in my son.
customer_reviews.author: Sayerone.2012

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clubs for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as my first set of clubs, and i have been out with them 6 times now. I think these are pretty good, i used my buddies set that were way more expensive than these, and they felt pretty much the same. The only thing i would add is a driver, other than that, the bad is solid and well made, the clubs are holding up very well in my inexperienced hands and golf is actually way more fun than i thought it would be. I would totally buy these again
customer_reviews.author: J. Truxton

customer_reviews.title: Short driver but better control with swing.
customer_reviews.text: My first set of clubs and they're great.. Was worried about the length because of my height..im 6'3 with a wing span of almost 80".. The driver is 42" but perfect for me because of my long arms..
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great golf club set for fare-weather golfers like me. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Bad longevity - after 10 rounds the heads fell off, the handles bent, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Maria B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Clubs
customer_reviews.text: I feel sure there are much better clubs out there, but for the price this is a great place to start. I'm new to golfing and am just happy to have a complete set. I think if I actually start to get any better at it I may look for better drivers and a better putter later on down the road, but the irons are fine. I've only been to the driving range a handful of times, but these clubs have worked great for me.
customer_reviews.author: R. Leverette

customer_reviews.title: These golf clubs made a great graduation gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: These golf clubs made a great graduation gift for my son. He still has them and they are his favorite clubs to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Landry

customer_reviews.title: Great for novices
customer_reviews.text: These clubs were pretty good. If you are just beginning to play golf and you want to just see how the sport is, this is the set you want. If you like the sport and want to get into the sport more after using these, I'd buy a new set after. There is no hybrid nor putter cover however. And the driver broke so I use a Callaway driver and mike iron set and bag now, but if you're just starting and don't want to break the bank and want some decent clubs, I recom these.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jack Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with this product. I think I bought this for about $100 dollars and it was a good buy. Haven't had any issue with any of the clubs and so far, this has been a pretty good bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Stern

customer_reviews.title: Confidence GOLF Mens POWER Hybrid Club Set & Stand Bag
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner golfer and I find this sport to be very boring. That being said, I was not about to out and spend $500 on a set of clubs. For $100, this set is great. It has everything you need for a round of golf. If I ever get more into it, then I may buy a set that comes with more irons, but for now this set is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: ccc1718

customer_reviews.title: quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: took these out the other day and i am just a beginner however the little bit i do know the clubs felt good with my research seemed like i couldn't get a better deal for the money. $150 and playing in two days!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Doss

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget to get a good driver, too
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered 2 sets of these clubs after reading the reviews, and one of the reviews stated that the bag does not contain a driver, so I went to the web site for the sporting goods company, and purchased a really expensive driver ($300 list price) for only $9.00. I was able to link the purchase through Amazon, since they are a partner. Ram Golf- FX 400cc Titanium 10° Driver. From the reviews, I see that it is best to purchase the driver as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for beginners. I have played two 18 hole games, been to the driving range 3 times hitting over 6 buckets of balls and have not broken or dented a single club. If your looking for a good set to get started on and really learn the game look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Fosh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got two golf bags for my grandsons. They LOVED EM. Well made, attractive, sturdy, Professional quality.
customer_reviews.author: H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Breakage
customer_reviews.text: My son has only used these clubs maybe 6 times, and has had 3 clubs break!! Not very strong shafts on these clubs!
customer_reviews.author: JAF1028

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter set for the price. My son is 15 and has played eight times. Four utilizing this set and he is reporting he is glad he purchased this set.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Waayenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My first set of golf clubs and love them so far! Seem to be great quality!
customer_reviews.author: NIghtFury

customer_reviews.title: Value pricing for secondary use or for beginner
customer_reviews.text: Value priced as a second home set . Hybrids feel good and bag is light weight .
customer_reviews.author: Timore

customer_reviews.title: Good First Set but Clubs Already Broken!
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the other reviews where people complained that the 3W broke at the range - we'll it happened to me. I broke both the 3W and 5W - the heads flew off into the range! I'm not a hack either - I hit about the same as the average joe. Also: there is no driver in this set, it's a 3W and it's a Ladies club too! It reads 'Ladies Flex' right along the side. The irons are rock-solid though and putter feels very responsive too. All in all this is a pretty good purchase considering how much you're paying.
customer_reviews.author: Derek A. Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Merry Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and he was able to try them out on a beautiful day before he left to go back to college. He thought they were great and he was very pleased. I was pleased for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Mundil

customer_reviews.title: Great set of clubs for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs for beginners. I've only used 2 clubs so far since taking golf lessons. My coach said they are a really good set. Rec'd clubs really fast & in prime condition. Bag is good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Mcookey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set for the price. Plays as well as my graphite set. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: trikeman

customer_reviews.title: The bag itself required a little work when it came ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself required a little work when it came to the zipper and was missing one gulf club. I can say that the handle of the clubs swing very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Dean Maynard

customer_reviews.title: good club i recognized now pricey club doesn't take enough ...
customer_reviews.text: good club i recognized now pricey club doesn't take enough the performance compare to price, only efforts take a performance for 99% golfers
customer_reviews.author: Tom Jin

customer_reviews.title: The price was great to get into the sport without spending too much
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner and have no complaints about this set so far. The price was great to get into the sport without spending too much.
customer_reviews.author: somekindofreviewperson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my brother who is just learning golf. He loves the set, and friends who are teaching him say it's good too. The driver head popped off his first day out (he says many people around him on the driving range laughed and said that had happened to them too), but the company was very good about replacing it promptly.
customer_reviews.author: quirkyla

customer_reviews.title: Excelllent basic set - From what little I know
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yr old son just started and I coincidentally did also, so I picked up this set for us both to use, our golf pro is comfortable with the sizing for us both (My 13 yr old only 3 inches shorter than me) so my gamble paid off. We are enjoying using these and definitely feel that we got our money's worth if not more.
customer_reviews.author: KNS

customer_reviews.title: Great golf set for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner in golf it's a good starter set. The quality is great.. I would recommend this set for those of you who want to try golf as a sport..
customer_reviews.author: derek

customer_reviews.title: Not going to win an Open but perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a set of clubs in the States, as I am visiting often, didn't fancy carting mine back and forth, so this were a perfect solution. Perfectly good clubs for a middle handicapper that fancies a knockabout every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robert A. Mclaren

customer_reviews.title: Decent Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent starter set. I have used it a few times. Once winter breaks I plan on using it more. At $100 it isn't bad. The only downside is that it has no driver. I had to buy that seperately.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Snead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good first starter set they work really well for me I have no complaints I love them
customer_reviews.author: Leon Maxie Jr

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: We really won't know if this was a good buy until golf season.
customer_reviews.author: hnv

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the money
customer_reviews.text: After 4 years not so much as picking up a golf club, I decided to get back into the game and needed a new set. I am a casual golfer and will probably play 1-2 times per month. I took this set out this weekend and was very pleased with the quality of the clubs and the bag, given the price. If you are just starting out in golf or getting back into the game, this a great set of clubs and bag for the right price!
customer_reviews.author: P. Krembs ~P.K.~

customer_reviews.title: Generic Golf clubs
customer_reviews.text: Really liked how fast I got these in the mail, and how safe the packaging was. The bag is pretty durable and i'm happy about all the things that came with this set. My husband only plays recreationally and I believe these will be a perfect fit for his needs. Loved the golf bag, seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs
customer_reviews.text: Got em on sale and they've hit like a champ so far. Would recommend to anyone who wants a good set of clubs
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: ... a 3 and 5 wood but over all a good deal for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: could use a 3 and 5 wood but over all a good deal for a beginner. The bag with clubs is not heavy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Vandeweerd

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set! Hybrid is surprisingly very easy to hit and very consistent. All clubs are great. Would recommend getting this set along with a better putter and if you're like me and want options, a better driver. (Nothing is wrong with putter or driver)
customer_reviews.author: Zack Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a more expensive version at Dicks, but returned after I got this. I was very impressed with the comparative quality (from bag to clubs), especially for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: David Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Club broke after hitting only 3 balls
customer_reviews.text: 8 iron broke above the hosel after hitting only 3 balls. Really hoping for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good introductory set
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set if your curious about playing golf; its economical and pretty nice looking. Great for those of us who are not sure if we want to take up this game.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Confidence Clubs- great clubs for great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this product. It came in a great package. Contained a nice golf club and nice clubs for a beginner golfer. Can't beat the price. If this product was available in Costco or other stores it would sell out left and right! Guaranteed.
customer_reviews.author: ARP007

customer_reviews.title: I like it so much
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much of a golfer, but this set was far beyond my expectations. I like it so much, I've been out golfing a full round nearly every day since I bought them over a week ago. If you want to simply give golf a go to see if you like it, you cannot go wrong with these. I guess they're not supposed to be a great set, but I sure have no plans to upgrade anytime soon. These already feel upgraded! I drop the 6 and 8 irons and walk every round, and have been completely satisfied with the weight and comfort of the bag. I have used the auto-stand mechanism about 500 times and it is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Therrien

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I return two Items more than a week and still my bank haven't received the money. What's going on?
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Arrazola

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These golf clubs were exactly what I needed as a beginning golfer. They're economical, they look great, and the grips fit the hands well. I've thoroughly enjoyed using the Inferno golf club set!
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs for my son to learn on.
customer_reviews.author: N. Bertson

customer_reviews.title: My family was very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The item was explained very well & I thought that it was a great value for the price. My family hasn't golfed with them yet but they are excited to try them out. Very striking colors on the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great value! My 12 year old son decided he wanted to learn to play. This was a perfect set to start with. These are men's regular length and everything in the set you need.
customer_reviews.author: dmicki

customer_reviews.title: clubs swing nice and good for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: i just received the clubs yesterday and brought them to the range today, i dented my driver on my first swing but not enough to ruin the play-ability of the club. everything felt nice and well made, i'm really happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Galindo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Clubs
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Christmas for my 14 year old son, who is almost 6 foot tall, so he needed an adult size set of clubs. He loves them!!! They are a great starter set.
customer_reviews.author: S. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My husband just got into golf and I got him these clubs for his bday. He loves then and is super excited to go all the time now! Great clubs for the price, now I am thinking to get myself some.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good Standby or Beginner Set
customer_reviews.text: Good set for my son who hadn't played in 3 years and got bigger!. Good set of standby clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P

customer_reviews.title: Golf Clubs and bag
customer_reviews.text: my son is THRILLED with his birthday present...he's a beginner golfer, and these were a lot of club for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Clubs are great set for the price I recently play in a golf tournament and I had all I needed
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Torres

customer_reviews.title: Okay item, but not great
customer_reviews.text: My husband had this set for 3 months and had only used it 3 times when the head of the hybrid club flew off when we were golfing. I was thankful it did not hit anyone. It seems to be okay for beginners, but you may want to invest in a better set of clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mcmahon

customer_reviews.title: Golf Clubs
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set for a beginner. I paid $120 for the clubs. It included a golf bag, 2 hybrid drivers, 3, iron, 7 iron, 8 iron, 9 iron and 2 putters. However, there wasn't a 5 iron in the set. The clubs served me well as a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Confidence Golf Clubs
customer_reviews.text: I have had this set of clubs for a while and they are still great. For a cheaper set of clubs and a brand I have never heard of they are great! They are not as durable to scratches as some of the other brands I have own but I still like them.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel B

customer_reviews.title: First Set
customer_reviews.text: This was my first set of clubs and was happy what I paid for. Took them out for the first time and friends were surprised at the price and quality. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great golf clubs
customer_reviews.text: This was a great beginner set of clubs for me. My friends who are also beginning always want to use my clubs. A steal of a deal for a set to just get out and learn the game.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excelent and great price! My husban is super happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G.

customer_reviews.title: Golf Clubs
customer_reviews.text: very happy with my first set of golf clubs. plus you can't beat the price
customer_reviews.author: W. J. McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Confidence Golf Clubs
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. If you are a beginner, these are the clubs for you.
customer_reviews.author: pretzel man

customer_reviews.title: Great 'YOUTH' deal
customer_reviews.text: This set of golf clubs is a great deal for you kid when they hit the 'teenage' years. They have obviously grown out of their tiny kid clubs and needing something in between before investing in a set of adult clubs for them. These are ideal, great value, great selection of clubs...and even if this is your kid's first set of clubs...a great start. All in all a GREAT buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tidy Tina

customer_reviews.title: Confidence Golf Set
customer_reviews.text: Once I saw the asking price I ordered them immediately. These are my first set of clubs. I'm very pleased with them. I'm 6'3 being that I don't know any better because I'm a beginner golfer, I don't know if they are short for my height. I must say they did feel pretty comfortable. Last week I tried them out for the first time at the range and I hit the ball better then ever. Not sure if I was doing something right or if it was the clubs. By far the best iron I like is the 7 and 8. I'm looking forward to hitting the course soon.
customer_reviews.author: Villardishes

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: I've used them four times and have had no problems with head flying off or anything like that. Got the blue bag just like the picture. Bought a cheap bag cart from Amazon and it works well too. Now I have to figure out why I'm not hitting the ball well - club or me? I suggest getting lessons first and then deciding on the clubs. I should have done that but I was in a hurry to play with some friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT first set
customer_reviews.text: I have used this set for over a year... no complaints. For $120, I don't have one negative thing to say about this set.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Confidence GOLF Mens POWER Hybrid Club Set & Stand Bag  Review
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price-- steel shafts are great. A head cover for the hybrid would be nice. Stand bag is good quality. Completely satisfied with the quality vs the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice love the hybrid. Love the irons. Would recommend them to anyone !! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Jim lufrano

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to buy clubs that are going to break within a week, well here are the clubs for you. The heads on each club are way to heavy which breaks them so quick. I don't even know why these are being sold because they are that bad. The price looks good but you might as well throw you $100 in the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Moore

customer_reviews.title: A good set for the money.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and exactly as advertised. A good set for the money. Not much more to say here other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great set of beginner clubs
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginning golfer and this set of clubs are perfect for me, They have a good feel and the set contains all of the needed clubs. The finish is good and the set looks good and so does the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dave McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Good beginners set
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my younger brother and its held up to 4 rounds per week for the last year. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alex O.

customer_reviews.title: golf set
customer_reviews.text: One of the items that was supposed to come with the adult mens golf set was not included in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: wendy langley

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The golf club set was better than expected. The clubs are a perfect size for my 13 year old who is 54" tall. He can most likely still use this set next year as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: you get what you payfor
customer_reviews.text: i got this set it came in looking nice but the first time i used the clubs the heads came off wouldnt recommend them
customer_reviews.author: chefjeff

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for Christmas for my 11 year-old son. The clubs were delivered in two days - well beyond my expectation and at no extra cost. My son is very happy with the clubs and says "they were a great deal." They have a good look and feel to them and perform quite well. Overall I'm very happy with this purchase. The only negative thing I have to say is that the irons seem to "bruise" rather easily, even after a single use. That generally does not happy with quality clubs, but it does not seem to be impacting their performance. I would make another purchase from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Their service was the best I'll seen in years. They help me to get my son's birthday gift to him on time. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ferris Keller

customer_reviews.title: excellent for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent set for a beginner golfer. I bought it while learning to play and was very pleased. The clubs are very forgiving and the built in stand on the bag is a huge plus. The set also comes with a hybrid which is great because it takes the place of a fairway wood that beginners may have trouble hitting. I would definitely recommend this set to any beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: This golf bag/club set is excellent! The quality of the clubs and bag is great! Perfect for a begineer like me! Lots of pockets and compartments on the bag along with the stand. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Artistic

customer_reviews.title: Not such a good Christmas present.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my 16 year old son for Christmas. We live in Utah and last night was the first time he got them out to go and hit a bucket of balls. After about 15 minutes the club head of the biggest club flew off and went almost as far as the ball did. Guess they should have used better glue! I figured for the price that the set wasn't going to be all that good, but I thought it would last longer than 15 minutes. Very disappointed and will not buy from Golf Outlet of America again.
customer_reviews.author: Gayleen Coates

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really good golf club for beginners! With this set I can go the golf course every week to practice. It helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Luffy

customer_reviews.title: Great Clubs, right size
customer_reviews.text: These clubs were a birthday present for my 12 year old boy (just turned). They fit him great with room to grow (I'm thinking 2 years). We've only used the clubs once, but so far they appear sturdy and well built. My son loves them. I thought this set had better range of club sizes than other sets that I looked at. The clubs were also longer than other Jr. sets, therefore being better suited for pre & early teen boys. I would certainly purchase them again. Delivery was on time.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Willemann III

customer_reviews.title: Natural he says
customer_reviews.text: Grandkid using them. Coach says he is a natural. Baloney?
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Shofner

customer_reviews.title: I bought these clubs in August 2015. Used them ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these clubs in August 2015. Used them for the rest of the season with no issue. This year I have had the hybrid head come off the shaft twice. Was able to reinstall the head on the shaft. I had the head on the 7 iron fly off and into a water hazard. This is a decent set for beginners. But remember you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: JOSH BAIRD

customer_reviews.title: Broke on second use
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap set. One of the clubs broke the second time I used it. I am going to return this product and I won't be buying from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: gh345

customer_reviews.title: Club heads broke off
customer_reviews.text: I order this set of golf clubs. They were fine however the last two times my son used them the heads to three of the irons broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't have asked for more for the price. Perfect for my 11-year-old son. We hit balls today for the first time with the set, and the clubs had some good pop.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Berg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set for a new player!!! Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Worst clubs ever! Sold them for $50 to my dad and bought a set of top flite that I got 10x better and more accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: ... set came in before expected and has been a great starter set
customer_reviews.text: The set came in before expected and has been a great starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but just a little problem.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my friend who is living in Tokyo. He said he like the stuff. The bag is nice but just had a little problem. The zipper got separated. I hope we can replace it even just bag.
customer_reviews.author: CaMhae

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible set of clubs! Pretty much glued together with cheap material. Broke on first swing...... Do not recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: nh

product_meta.title: Confidence Golf Power V3 Mens Golf Clubs Set & Stand Bag
product_meta.description:
Looking to take up the game of golf but don't want to break the bank on clubs? Turn to the Confidence Power men's hybrid club set, which includes everything you need to hit the links with confidence. The set's long clubs include driver and a 24-degree hybrid wood with a steel shaft. The hybrid replaces the difficult-to-hit longer irons without sacrificing an ounce of performance. For the mid-range to short approach shots, you can pull out one of the cavity-backed irons, which are built to offer more forgiveness. The set includes steel-shafted 6-, 7-, 8-, and 9-irons, along with a pitching wedge. And beginning golfers can make short work of the greens thanks to the steel-shafted putter. The set concludes with an upgraded stand bag with auto-pop legs, plenty of external pockets, and a rain cover. 

About Confidence Golf 
Founded in 1967, Confidence Golf has been producing innovative, high-quality golf equipment aimed at beginners and improving golfers for more than 40 years. Confidence Golf is owned by Sports PLC, a limited company registered in England and Wales.
